name: Jeremiah's Mirror
description:
Jeremiah's Mirror is a short psychological horror adventure game about a man with a split personality. Touching the mirror in the attic changes your personality to a demonic one. Your purpose sounds simple: You need to call your ex-wife to say you love her, but it won't be that easy.

There are 4 endings. Will you be able to discover all of them?

The game isn't realtime 3D, it uses pre-rendered visuals. So that you get the visual quality of the screenshots even in older computers and the download size is low (27 MB for WebGL).

Content Warning:
  • Murder
  • Mild language
